1.title: Urban Expression
1.details: A stunning street artwork expressing urban culture.
1.plots: This graffiti was made using spray paint with a mix of abstract and realism.

2.title: Street Vibes
2.details: A vibrant display of street creativity.
2.plots: Features a combination of freehand and stencil techniques.

3.title: Wall of Colors
3.details: A colorful masterpiece covering an entire street wall.
3.plots: Created by a group of artists in a community project.
